title: Chef's salad
ingredients: ['45g can anchovy fillets in olive oil, drained and roughly chopped', '1 garlic clove, roughly chopped', '1/2 tsp Dijon mustard', '4 tbsp extra virgin olive oil', '1 tbsp lemon juice', '2 tbsp double cream', '1 cos lettuce, torn into bite-sized pieces', '4 tomatoes, cut into wedges', '1 avocado, diced', '1/4 cucumber, diced', '100g Gouda cheese, diced', '100g roast ham, diced']
